price: 28. (Muuse) wuxuu yidhi: Sidaasi waa (ballan) dhexdeenna ah aniga iyo adiga midkaan labada muddo oofiyo, ma jiri doonto wax laygu colaadiyo, Alle baana ka damiin (markhaati) ah waxaanu leennahay.
arabic: قَالَ ذَٰلِكَ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكَۖ أَيَّمَا ٱلۡأَجَلَيۡنِ قَضَيۡتُ فَلَا عُدۡوَٰنَ عَلَيَّۖ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَا نَقُولُ وَكِيلٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla dhālika baynī wabaynaka ayyamā al-ajalayni qaḍaytu falā ʿud'wāna ʿalayya wal-lahu ʿalā mā naqūlu wakīlun
